Reason/Attribution: There was delay in delivery of some equipment by the supplier before the close of the financial year. The supplier claimed to have ordered for the items from abroad but could not arrive in time for payments to be made. The funds were swept back.
There was no recruitment done since the entity had received the supplementary for wage in last month of the year.
This was a supplementary for feeding Covid 19 patients and staff. This time Covid19 cases had reduced and the funds could not be utilized.
There were no pending gratuity files to pay.
